page.title: 17LIFE IN BALLYCLARE
page.content:
Life in Ballyclare is very homely and warm. Everybody seems to know everybody else.Any shop you go into is warmed by {hospitality. { { }There is not so much in Ballyclare for the {younger generation}but there several blocks of houses and flats in Ballyclare for the elderly.
Ballyclare is not dirty and cold desolated as some towns are.In fact by the looks of things the majority of Ballyclare folk are house proud. There are only a few houses in need of repair.I am sure anybody who has lived in Ballyclare will always meet a friend whilst on a shopping visit to Ballyclare.
